Posts.Content:
Hello There everyone! I am new here. I have been searching for positive survival stories. My sweet friend is battling cancer right now and was given 12 months to live. I have been reading an amazing book called, "It's Just Hair: 20 Essential Life Lessons" by Judith L. Pearson. his a non-fiction self-help book for women battling breast cancer or anyone facing a challenge in life that is written in a humorous, inspirational and encouraging tone. http://courageconcepts.com/
It's hard to imagine that there can be something positive come out of something so horrible.
Posts.Title: Finding Hope
